entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
